name: FISHER PILOT 33
notes:
S&S#539.
First in series of yachts in this size range (by S&S) called 'Pilot'. 
(The first post WWII S&S design) 
First built by Fisher Boat Works in Detroit, MI,  and later by Thomas Knudson in Huntington, NY.
AKA S&S PILOT, it was followed, a number of years later, by 2 other, more popular versions built by Henry Hinckley.
The last and best known is the HINCKLEY PILOT 35 (1962).
